document.full_text: popcap games inc, the maker of popular smartphone and facebook games "bejeweled" and "plants vs zombies," could list as early as november, it chief executive david roberts said on wednesday.
document.title: popcap games ready to be listed as early as nov: ceo
lines_and_colors: popcap games inc, the maker of popular smartphone and facebook games "bejeweled" and "plants vs zombies," could list as early as november, it chief executive david roberts said on wednesday.
